io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.placeholder

Interface Placeholder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.spongepowered.api.text.TextElement, org.spongepowered.api.text.TextRepresentable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Placeholder.Option, Placeholder.Standard

    public interface Placeholder
extends org.spongepowered.api.text.TextRepresentable
    A TextRepresentable that can be used in Text building methods that represents a placeholder in text.

    While such placeholders will generally be built from tokenised strings, (such as NucleusTextTemplate objects, these objects make no assumption about the format of text templating. Such as system can therefore be used by other templating engines without conforming to the Nucleus standard.

    If you are a plugin that wishes to use the Nucleus text template format, use NucleusTextTemplateFactory.createFromString(String) instead.

    Due to the potential for game objects being stored within the placeholders, they should not be held for longer than necessary.

      A common interface for the placeholder builders.

      static interface  Placeholder.Standard
      A placeholder that represents a plugin provided placeholder.
      static interface  Placeholder.StandardBuilder
      A builder for Placeholder.Standard objects.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Placeholder.StandardBuilder builder()
      Returns a builder that creates a Placeholder that represents plugin provided placeholders.
      org.spongepowered.api.text.Text getAppendingTextIfNotEmpty()
      Gets any Text that will be appended to the output returned by this placeholder if it not empty.

      Gets any Text that will be prepend to the output returned by this placeholder if it not empty.
      static Placeholder.OptionBuilder option()
      Returns a builder that creates a Placeholder that represents a named Subject.getOption(String), parsed using the given TextSerializer.
